results.title: Characterising the expression of the organic cation transporter OCT3 in cutaneous papillomas of dogs.
results.text_hl: Recent evidence indicates that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces the size of @<m>DISEASE_Papilloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010212 @@@CPs@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by inhibiting the @GENE_MTOR @GENE_478232 @@@mTOR@@@ signalling pathway.

citations.NLM: Sanz Ressel BL, Gomez Castro G, Mórtola EC, Massone AR, Barbeito CG. Characterising the expression of the organic cation transporter OCT3 in cutaneous papillomas of dogs. Vet Dermatol. 2024 Oct 2;():. PMID: 39355916
citations.BibTeX: @article{39355916, title={Characterising the expression of the organic cation transporter OCT3 in cutaneous papillomas of dogs.}, author={Sanz Ressel BL and Gomez Castro G and Mórtola EC and Massone AR and Barbeito CG}, journal={Vet Dermatol}}

results.title: Improvement of acanthosis nigricans on isotretinoin and metformin.
results.text_hl: We report a case of a 55-year-old @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ male who developed @DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@ with striking @<m>DISEASE_Papilloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010212 @@@papillomatosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Hairy_palms_and_soles @DISEASE_MESH:C535620 @@@tripe palms@@@ who experienced improvement on a long-term tapering dosage of @CHEMICAL_Isotretinoin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015474 @@@isotretinoin@@@, with additional benefit with the addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Walling HW, Messingham M, Myers LM, Mason CL, Strauss JS. Improvement of acanthosis nigricans on isotretinoin and metformin. J Drugs Dermatol. 2003 Dec;2(6):677-81. PMID: 14711151
citations.BibTeX: @article{14711151, title={Improvement of acanthosis nigricans on isotretinoin and metformin.}, author={Walling HW and Messingham M and Myers LM and Mason CL and Strauss JS}, journal={J Drugs Dermatol}, volume={2}, number={6}, pages={677-81}}

results.title: Metformin inhibits skin tumor promotion in overweight and obese mice.
results.text_hl: A low-dose combination of these two compounds displayed an additive inhibitory effect on @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ development. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment also reduced the size of @<m>DISEASE_Papilloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010212 @@@papillomas@@@.

citations.NLM: Checkley LA, Rho O, Angel JM, Cho J, Blando J, Beltran L, Hursting SD, DiGiovanni J. Metformin inhibits skin tumor promotion in overweight and obese mice. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2014 Jan;7(1):54-64. PMID: 24196830
citations.BibTeX: @article{24196830, title={Metformin inhibits skin tumor promotion in overweight and obese mice.}, author={Checkley LA and Rho O and Angel JM and Cho J and Blando J and Beltran L and Hursting SD and DiGiovanni J}, journal={Cancer Prev Res (Phila)}, volume={7}, number={1}, pages={54-64}}
